name: San Francisco Housing Development Corporation
description: The mission of SFHDC is to foster financial stability through the development of affordable housing, the facilitation of homeownership, and the economic empowerment and revitalization of Bayview Hunters Point and other neighborhoods of Southeast San Francisco. Events and Workshops by SFHDC’s Financial Empowerment Center provided insights and education in navigating the San Francisco BMR (below market rate) housing system for first-time homeowners and finding and keeping affordable housing for lo
